definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
surgeon/as opposed to physician 內科醫生|内科医生[nei4 ke1 yi1 sheng1], who works primarily by administering drugs

pinyin: zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of diagnosis and surgical treatment for giant tumor of mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨大纵隔肿瘤的诊断和外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: SETTING Department of Operation Surgery Union Hospital Affiliated to Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 华中科技大学同济医学院附属协和医院手外科。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical treatment in massive hemorrhage of gastroduodenal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃十二指肠溃疡大出血的外科治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical application of keyhole craniotomy microsurgery in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨锁孔入路显微手术在神经外科的应用。

sentences.english: Analysis of risk factors for nosocomial infection of urologic al surgical department.
sentences.chinese: 泌尿外科医院感染危险因素分析。

sentences.english: Some surgeries and drugs could lead to the sphincter of Oddi dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 某些外科手术或药物会引起奥狄氏括约肌机能障碍。

sentences.english: Yuchang Zou has been engaged in cosmetic surgery for 19 years after his clinical graduation.
sentences.chinese: 临床本科毕业，从事美容外科工作19年。

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中国医疗系统的弊病绝不仅仅局限于美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Methods Multimedia technology was used in cardiothoracic surgical teaching.
sentences.chinese: 方法在胸心外科教学中使用多媒体教学方法。

sentences.english: Objective To review the surgical treatment of 681 infants with congenital heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结681例婴幼儿先天性心脏病外科治疗经验。

sentences.english: I would not hold this up as comparable to surgical mitral valve repair.
sentences.chinese: 我不会认为它的效果与二尖瓣外科修补相当。

sentences.english: In One type of heart surgery, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如有一种心脏外科手术。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze and explore the diagnosis and surgical treatment of levoversion and isolated levocardia.
sentences.chinese: 分析探讨左旋心和孤立左位心的诊断和外科治疗。

sentences.english: A surgeon asked him what's his surname.
sentences.chinese: 一名外科医生问他姓什么。

sentences.english: I doubt many surgeons inthe U.S. are currently using it.
sentences.chinese: 不过我估计美国还有不少外科医生在用肠线。

sentences.english: Garwood says there is a critical need for surgeons.
sentences.chinese: Garwood表示，现在亟需外科医生。

definition: department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
surgeon/as opposed to physician 內科醫生|内科医生[nei4 ke1 yi1 sheng1], who works primarily by administering drugs
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
